engine.embed module

class engine.embed.RepoEmbedClient(aptus_token)[source]

Bases: object

BASE_URL = 'http://aptus.bio'
annotate(folder_path, output_path, lab_repo=None)[source]

Annotates documents or patient records within the specified folder.

Args:

folder_path (str): Path to the folder containing the documents or patient records. output_path (str): Path where the annotated documents or patient records should be saved. lab_repo (str, optional): The lab repository to use for additional context in patient record annotations. Defaults to None.

classmethod interactive_session(aptus_token)[source]

Starts an interactive session for annotating documents or patient records.
